zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼不大拉·聂尼阿鲁马空苏丹阿都哈密·哈林沙
en: Tunku Abdul Rahman Putra Al-Haj ibni Almarhum Sultan Abdul Hamid Halim Shah

birth_place.zh-cn: 亚罗士打, 吉打苏丹国

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚首任首相，被尊为马来西亚国父。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of Malaysia, revered as the Father of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第二任首相，接替东姑阿都拉曼。
description.en: The second Prime Minister of Malaysia, succeeding Tunku Abdul Rahman.

en: Prime Minister of the Federation of Malaya

description.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the Federation of Malaya.

nodes.id: 马来亚联合邦首席部长

zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦首席部长
en: Chief Minister of the Federation of Malaya

description.zh-cn: 英属马来亚联合邦的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the British-ruled Federation of Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 前英国女王及其他英联邦王国女王，在马来亚联合邦独立前是其国家元首。
description.en: Former Queen of the United Kingdom and other Commonwealth realms, she was the head of state for the Federation of Malaya before its independence.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际组织，由57个成员国组成，是伊斯兰世界的集体声音。
description.en: An international organization consisting of 57 member states, which is the collective voice of the Muslim world.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚吉打州的首府。
description.en: The state capital of Kedah, Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的首都和最大城市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个右翼民族主义政党。
description.en: A right-wing nationalist political party in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个已解散的政治联盟，是国民阵线的前身。
description.en: A defunct political coalition in Malaysia, the predecessor of Barisan Nasional.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个主要政党联盟。
description.en: A major political party coalition in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Tunku Abdul Rahman.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Tunku Abdul Rahman.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼的第三任妻子。
description.en: The third wife of Tunku Abdul Rahman.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼的第四任妻子。
description.en: The fourth wife of Tunku Abdul Rahman.

description.zh-cn: 吉打州第25任统治者，东姑阿都拉曼的父亲。
description.en: The 25th ruler of Kedah, father of Tunku Abdul Rahman.

description.zh-cn: 苏丹阿都哈密哈林沙的第四位王妃，东姑阿都拉曼的母亲。
description.en: The fourth consort of Sultan Abdul Hamid Halim Shah, mother of Tunku Abdul Rahman.

nodes.id: 剑桥大学圣凯瑟琳学院

zh-cn: 剑桥大学圣凯瑟琳学院

description.zh-cn: 英国剑桥大学的组成学院之一。
description.en: A constituent college of the University of Cambridge in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 位于伦敦的四个律师学院之一。
description.en: One of the four Inns of Court in London.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的前身，于1957年8月31日获得独立。
description.en: The predecessor to Malaysia, which gained independence on 31 August 1957.

description.zh-cn: 由马来亚、新加坡、沙巴和砂拉越于1963年合并组成的联邦国家。
description.en: A federal state formed in 1963 through the merger of Malaya, Singapore, Sabah, and Sarawak.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚吉隆坡发生的族群骚乱事件，对该国政治产生深远影响。
description.en: An incident of sectarian violence that took place in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, which had a profound impact on the country's politics.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚的一个岛国和城市国家。曾于1963年至1965年加入马来西亚联邦。
description.en: An island city-state in Southeast Asia. It was part of the Federation of Malaysia from 1963 to 1965.

description.zh-cn: 一份使新加坡脱离马来西亚，成为独立主权国家的协议。
description.en: An agreement that separated Singapore from Malaysia, allowing it to become an independent and sovereign state.

description.zh-cn: 一场在英属马来亚发生的游击战，主要在马来亚民族解放军和英联邦武装部队之间进行。
description.en: A guerrilla war fought in British Malaya between the Malayan National Liberation Army and the armed forces of the British Commonwealth.

description.zh-cn: 前马来亚共产党总书记。
description.en: Former Secretary General of the Malayan Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡首任首席部长。
description.en: The first Chief Minister of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦政府与马来亚共产党之间的一次和平谈判，旨在结束马来亚紧急状态，但最终以失败告终。
description.en: Peace negotiations between the government of the Federation of Malaya and the Malayan Communist Party aimed at ending the Malayan Emergency, which ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 一个于1930年成立的政党，在马来亚紧急状态期间与英联邦部队作战。
description.en: A political party founded in 1930, which fought against Commonwealth forces during the Malayan Emergency.

description.zh-cn: 印度第三任总理。
description.en: The third Prime Minister of India.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡首任总理。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 巫统的创始人和首任主席。
description.en: The founder and first president of UMNO.

description.zh-cn: 前马来西亚财政部长和马来西亚华人公会总会长。
description.en: Former Minister of Finance of Malaysia and president of the Malaysian Chinese Association.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任和第七任首相。
description.en: The fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十任首相。
description.en: The tenth Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼撰写的关于五一三事件的书籍。
description.en: A book written by Tunku Abdul Rahman about the 13 May incident.

relationships.target: 马来亚联合邦首席部长

position.zh-cn: 马来亚联合邦首席部长
position.en: Chief Minister of the Federation of Malaya

description.zh-cn: 在马来亚独立前，作为首席部长向英国女王（国家元首）负责。
description.en: As Chief Minister before Malayan independence, he was responsible to the British Monarch (Head of State).

description.zh-cn: 在东姑阿都拉曼担任首相期间，敦阿都拉萨是其副手。
description.en: Tun Abdul Razak was the deputy to Tunku Abdul Rahman during his tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼辞职后，由敦阿都拉萨接任首相职务，构成职务接替关系。
description.en: After Tunku Abdul Rahman's resignation, Tun Abdul Razak succeeded him as Prime Minister, constituting a succession relationship.

relationships.target: 剑桥大学圣凯瑟琳学院

description.zh-cn: 领导马来亚联合邦取得独立。
description.en: Led the Federation of Malaya to achieve independence.

description.zh-cn: 于1961年提出成立马来西亚联邦的计划，并于1963年实现。
description.en: Proposed the plan to form the Federation of Malaysia in 1961, which was realized in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 1969年的五一三事件导致东姑阿都拉曼面临各方压力，最终于1970年辞去首相职务。
description.en: The 13 May incident in 1969 led to pressure from various parties, causing Tunku Abdul Rahman to resign as Prime Minister in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 由于与新加坡的政治分歧，东姑阿都拉曼在马来西亚国会推动新加坡退出联邦，最终促成其独立。
description.en: Due to political disagreements with Singapore, Tunku Abdul Rahman pushed for Singapore's withdrawal from the federation in the Malaysian Parliament, ultimately leading to its independence.

description.zh-cn: 在吉打华玲举行的“华玲会谈”中会面，试图结束马来亚紧急状态。
description.en: Met during the 'Baling Talks' in Baling, Kedah, in an attempt to end the Malayan Emergency.

description.zh-cn: 在吉打华玲举行的“华玲会谈”中会面，试图结束马来亚紧急状态。
description.en: Met during the 'Baling Talks' in Baling, Kedah, in an attempt to end the Malayan Emergency.

description.zh-cn: 由于不接受东姑阿都拉曼提出的投降条件，马来亚共产党拒绝了和平提议，导致和谈破裂。
description.en: The Malayan Communist Party rejected the peace proposal because it did not accept the surrender terms proposed by Tunku Abdul Rahman, leading to the breakdown of the talks.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，东姑阿都拉曼与时任印度总理英迪拉·甘地会面。
description.en: In 1968, Tunku Abdul Rahman met with the then Prime Minister of India, Indira Gandhi.

description.zh-cn: 在新加坡并入马来西亚期间，两人关系紧张，充满政治纠纷，最终导致新加坡脱离马来西亚。
description.en: During Singapore's inclusion in Malaysia, their relationship was tense and full of political disputes, ultimately leading to Singapore's separation from Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 东姑阿都拉曼于1951年8月接替翁惹化成为巫统主席，构成职务接替关系。
description.en: Tunku Abdul Rahman succeeded Onn Ja'afar as the president of UMNO in August 1951, constituting a succession relationship.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪·莫哈末在1991年国庆日前夕赞扬东姑阿都拉曼成功团结三大民族争取独立。
description.en: On the eve of National Day in 1991, Mahathir Mohamad praised Tunku Abdul Rahman for successfully uniting the three major ethnic groups to fight for independence.

description.zh-cn: 在1970年代担任马来亚大学马来语学会主席期间，安华·依布拉欣曾带领学生举行抗议行动，焚烧东姑的著作《513前后》的照片。
description.en: During his tenure as president of the Malay Language Society at the University of Malaya in the 1970s, Anwar Ibrahim led student protests to burn photos of Tunku's book 'May 13: Before and After'.
